none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 13, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
SHUT IN is disgusting. And really really pissed. Bombastic hardcore/crust at the very end of its rope - the low end is crushing, but the vocals are simply terrifying. There are blasts, there are devastating breakdowns (sometimes the two fall into each other with jaw dropping results) and everything is filthy. This is what it sounds like when you have had enough. FEAR/BLOOD Members of PROTESTANT, ABADDON, MALACHI, PARTY BY THE SLICE, NO BRAINER, ARCHITECTS OF THE AFTERMATH and others, in case you are keeping track or need extra incentive...
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-BHAo2Ii9lck/UqfU2IVRcsI/AAAAAAAAJK4/oMTJyenMWmQ/s1600/shut+in+cover+copy.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-45m8L1jywsI/Uqft496bxVI/AAAAAAAAJLI/DUFo5QlXiuk/s1600/shut+in+spine+copy.jpg

seo.title: Shut In - Fear/Blood demo 2013 - Terminal Escape
